text: Once per turn, you may remove any X virus counters from your installed cards to trash a non-agenda card you are accessing (even if it has no trash cost). X is that card's rez or play cost. Errata from CR 1.2
title: Freedom Khumalo: Crypto-Anarchist

flavor: Twisting, writhing, ripping into all that it touches.
text:
Install Trypano only on a piece of ice.
When Trypano has 5 or more virus counters on it, trash host ice.
When your turn begins, you may place 1 virus counter on Trypano.
title: Trypano

flavor: "What kind of maniac infects their own rig?!"
text: Place 3 virus counters on an installed Runner card with no hosted virus counters.
title: Contaminate

text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, name asset, ice, operation or upgrade, then reveal 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash each revealed card that has the named type, then gain 4[credit] for each card trashed this way.
title: Embezzle

flavor: Filaments occasionally flare from the Network, manifesting ephemeral threads between random domains.
text: Whenever you pass a rezzed piece of ice, you may trash Slipstream. If you do, choose a piece of ice protecting a central server in the same position as the passed ice. You are now approaching that ice.
title: Slipstream

text: When you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2[credit] to have it gain barrier until the end of the encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. 2[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 3[credit]: +6 strength.
title: Laamb

text: [click]: Host Gebrselassie on an installed non-AI icebreaker. Abilities that increase host icebreaker's strength last for the remainder of the turn instead of any other duration. Errata from CR 1.4
title: Gebrselassie

text: Make a run. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during this run, you may search your stack or heap for a program and install it, ignoring all costs. When the run ends, add that program to the bottom of your stack if it is still installed.
title: Compile

flavor: "Could God create a stone so heavy, He could not lift it?"
text: [trash]: Bypass a piece of ice you are currently encountering. Lose any remaining clicks.
title: Logic Bomb

text:
When your turn begins, you may place 1[credit] on Jackpot!.
Whenever an agenda is added to your score area, you may take any number of credits from Jackpot!. If you do, trash Jackpot!.
title: Jackpot!

text: When you score Remote Enforcement, you may search R&D for a piece of ice, install it protecting a remote server (paying its install cost), and rez it, ignoring its rez cost, then shuffle R&D.
title: Remote Enforcement

text:
The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Kamali 1.0.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage unless the Runner trashes an installed resource.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage unless the Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage unless the Runner trashes an installed program.
title: Kamali 1.0

flavor: "It's neither cruel nor unusual. Merely efficient."
text: Each piece of rezzed bioroid ice gains "[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able." before all of its other subroutines.
title: Warden Fatuma

flavor: Quicker and deadlier than ever imagined, the trial was an outstanding success.
text: When the turn on which you scored Viral Weaponization ends, do 1 net damage for each card in the grip.
title: Viral Weaponization

flavor: "On one hand, I knew I shouldn't touch it. On the other, it was really shiny." - Kabonesa Wu
text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Envelope

text: Install only in the root of HQ or R&D. Whenever the Runner accesses cards from this server, he or she accesses 3 additional cards. After accessing, gain 2[credit] for each card accessed. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Mwanza City Grid. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Mwanza City Grid

text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run on his or her last turn.
Name a card type, then reveal the grip. Gain 2[credit] for each card in the grip that has the named type.
title: Standard Procedure

text: If Intake is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Intake, trace 4 If successful, add an installed program or virtual resource to the grip. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Intake from Archives.
title: Intake

flavor: No matter which direction ze climbed, the blocks reshuffled, zipping in from left to right, bottom to top. It was going to be a long hike.
text:
Masvingo can be advanced.
When you rez Masvingo, place 1 advancement token on it.
Masvingo gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each advancement token on it.
title: Masvingo

flavor: The blast doesn't hurt, but what comes after does.
text: Whenever the Runner trashes a card in this server, you may pay 1[credit] to give the Runner 1 tag. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Overseer Matrix.
title: Overseer Matrix
